chapters.title: Chapter 47: The Price of a Ship
chapters.info: Mathena, p. 760 (540)—Woman Birgitte knew long ago that she thinks was like Nynaeve. She looked down her nose at men, and even executed a man when he chanced upon her when she was swimming naked. She was never kissed until Zheres stole one from her; after he did, it was as if she had discovered men for the first time. He eventually had to move to a home in the mountains to escape her. See also Zheres.
